text: <@UNW8Q88EL>

Using the wrong password would (should!) freeze the account rather than just giving a temporary error, and commercial software should use a client interactive logon with 2FA anyway.  Storing people's passwords and linking accounts definately sounds like one for Neil to look at.

elements.text: Using the wrong password would (should!) freeze the account rather than just giving a temporary error, and commercial software should use a client interactive logon with 2FA anyway.  Storing people's passwords and linking accounts definately sounds like one for Neil to look at.

text: When you transition say to above £250k lifetime profit and then get charged 40% PC, it states they assume you have always paid 40%, so up to that point you will have paid £50k charges, they then suddenly assume you’ve already paid £100k? You don’t have to suddenly pay Betfair £50k ??!!

elements.text: When you transition say to above £250k lifetime profit and then get charged 40% PC, it states they assume you have always paid 40%, so up to that point you will have paid £50k charges, they then suddenly assume you’ve already paid £100k? You
don’t
have to suddenly pay Betfair £50k ??!!

text: Hi <@U06G1373VB2> - please get in touch with me via <mailto:bdp@betfair.com|bdp@betfair.com>

text: No - it's the other way round. They assume that you've always paid 40% so that you don't have to catch up. They credit you with having paid the PC you would have paid if you'd always been paying 40%.

elements.text: No - it's the other way round. They assume that you've always paid 40% so that you don't have to catch up. They credit you with having paid the PC you would have paid if you'd always been paying 40%.

text: I'm not going to help you more than this so don't dm me about it; but there are some creative (but legitimate) options. If you're not that imaginative then maybe see if bumping your stakes slightly above the optimal increases your volatility without costing you overall. Otherwise you can try churning in a different sport at low margin, just don't do it in your main betting sport. Don't shit where you eat.
